content:
A new Forge release for STU3 is now available for download from https://fire.ly/forge/. Release 18.1 introduces our new Firely company identity and also provides a couple of improvements.

Overview of changes: https://simplifier.net/ui/OrganizationNews/Show?id=43

For questions, comments and/or issues, please contact us at forge@fire.ly.

Happy profiling!

Michel Rutten

FYI During the installation, Windows may display a Smartscreen warning about an untrusted publisher. This is caused by the new company certificate. Smartscreen requires a bit of time to build up a reputation. Eventually, after a number of downloads and installations, this warning should disappear.
